title: Turn off the tap while brushing your teeth
description: You could save up to 9 liters

title: Take a 5 minute shower
description: You could save up to 100 litres

title: Switch to a Low-Flow shower head
description: You could save up to 60 percent per month

title: Run the washing machine and dishwasher when you have a full load
description: You could save up to 5000 gallons per year
